attributes.action: Permit England a vote to separate Scotland from the United Kingdom.
attributes.background:
Scotland have had a vote to leave the UK, but under democratic due process and the fundamentals of a Union it's all parties that should be involved in the process.
Therefore England should be given the opportunity to decide if Scotland remains a part of the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125451
